edz.name: EdiZon
switchcheatsdb.name: SwitchCheatsDB
edz.widget.integer.title: Enter a value
edz.widget.integer.subtitle: This will be the new value for this property.
edz.widget.string.title: Enter some text
edz.widget.string.subtitle: This will be the new text for this property.
edz.gui.main.cheats.error.no_cheats: No cheats were loaded for this title
edz.gui.main.cheats.error.application_mo: EdiZon is running in application mode and cannot modify the memory of the current title. Please restart EdiZon using the Album.
edz.gui.main.cheats.error.dmnt_cht_missi: EdiZon depends on the dmnt:cht service to run cheats. Please make sure you installed your CFW correctly and that it has support for it.
edz.gui.main.about.label.edz: EdiZon is a multipurpose game enhancement tool for the Nintendo Switch. Special thanks to everybody that got involved in the development of this homebrew.
edz.gui.main.about.label.switchcheatsdb: To use most of the online features of EdiZon (save uploading and automatic cheats update) a SwitchCheatsDB account is required. Please visit switchcheatsdb.com for more information.
edz.gui.main.about.email.help: Please enter your SwitchCheatsDB email address
